website_summaries.verdict: With eight layers of protective film, MacBook users can get the privacy needed with this super easy-to-use screen.
pros: No messy tabs or tape to mar appearance of screen
just place screen over monitor and it sticks magnetically with no overhang
Added protection from UV and blue light
Prevents eyestrain caused by staring at the screen for long periods of time
cons: Will need to turn down screen intensity before using for maximum protection
May still need included clear strips if bottom of screen lifts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit to the screen - no overhanging edges or ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit to the screen - no overhanging edges or distracting overlaps. Magnetic top looks like part of your screen frame - is almost invisible. One idea would be to make the top magnetic strip solid for those of us who want to cover the camera completely......
customer_reviews.author: DC23701

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Product came fast, and also provides excellent privacy. However, due to the magnetic strip applied to the top of the film it has a little gap at the top. This gap causes the top portion of the screen to become fuzzy so the words are a little hard to read. Other than then product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sitokid

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I bought it to cut down on glare and eye strain. I could not be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P

customer_reviews.title: Best privacy screen!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the magnetic attachment...gives it a clean look. And it prevents nosy people around me from looking at sensitive information. I work with student data so it's imperative that I keep everything private and confidential.
customer_reviews.author: S. Park

customer_reviews.title: Great once it flattens out!
customer_reviews.text: Once it flattens out (curved from shipping) this thing is amazing! It really does provide great privacy on a plane or anywhere and you can barely tell it’s on. It softens the screen a bit, but overall worth it for the added privacy.
customer_reviews.author: esulivant

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever had a privacy screen for any laptop or computer, then you know that the screen isn't going to be as clear as it would if you put a privacy screen on your cell phone. I can still see everything and it works a bit better (for privacy purposes) if you lower the brightness of your screen. The magnet is super strong so I don't even need the additional adhesive pads unless I want to secure the bottom of the protector (not really necessary). **WHY I DIDN'T GIVE IT FIVE STARS** There's an opening for the webcam, but an optional cover is the only thing that's missing.
customer_reviews.author: AlabasterDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works as advertised. In fact, worked so well I purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT A PRIVACY SCREEN !
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a privacy screen that fit a 2018 MacBook Air and stayed in place. Got a tinted screen that stays in place, BUT IT IS NOT A PRIVACY SCREEN. Can be viewed on all sides
customer_reviews.author: TexBBQMan

customer_reviews.title: It works as it says it should
customer_reviews.text: I just put this product on my MacBook and I can already tell it will work well for exam taking purposes. My only issue is that it was delivered bent. So now there is a slight bow in the magnet and because of this the privacy screen at that bent point doesn't sit flat on the screen like the rest of the privacy protector. This could have been an carelessness issue with the delivery service but regardless I think this product will work for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The screen provides the privacy i need and the magnetic design is very convenient. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Yadhira Contreras

customer_reviews.title: BLURRED WORDS
customer_reviews.text: Although the aesthetic and magnet is nice, the blur that this product causes on the screen makes it nearly unusable when trying to use your laptop for extended periods of time. TLDR: Prepare to squint, words are blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Privacy comes with some trade-offs.
customer_reviews.text: The product did indeed cause my Macbook to not be able to close completely. But fortunately, I have a case on that latches shut negating the gap in the lid. I will however say that the privacy function works best when the screen is turned to approximately 50% brightness and below.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product for protecting info on flights
customer_reviews.text: Meets my needs. It fits nicely on my MacBook Air 13 inch and I'm able to close my laptop pretty easily. I bought it for flights. You do need to turn down the screen intensity for maximum protection. Happy with the magnetic attachment also.
customer_reviews.author: RK in Cambridge

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: This screen cover doesn't fit the screen properly. The cutout for the camera is in the wrong spot and covers half of the camera. The magnetic bar at the top covers the menu at the top of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: katem2112

customer_reviews.title: Great but one flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect privacy screen however it has one flaw. I have posted a picture of what happens when your computer screen gets a little too forward, A magnet at the bottom of the film as well would have made tremendous improvement on this.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Stenholm

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for anyone looking for a magnetic privacy screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works perfectly. Recommend this for anyone looking for a magnetic privacy screen for their MacBook Air.
customer_reviews.author: Perico N. Arcedo

customer_reviews.title: This does not work for privacy at all.
customer_reviews.text: You can easily see from a lot of angles. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product dims your screen a little and makes text slightly fuzzy when viewing from any angle (including directly in front of it). It does not actually obscure the image past 30 degrees as advertised. I can walk a complete 180 half circle around my screen and read the fuzzy text. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeph2005

customer_reviews.title: Product dimentions are given wrong. Dimentions should be 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: Product dimentions are given wrong. Dimentions should be 11.3 x 7.75. Also there were supposed to be 6 silicone stickers but it came with 2 of them removed. They definitely shipped an item returned by a prior customer without checking the content. Other then that, when the screen is fully lit, it showes the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Orcun Kurugol

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, Relaxes your eyes,  protects your privacy
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install. You lose a little bit of brightness but relaxes your eyes. Protects your privacy. The attached picture shows my MacBook screen with the Magnetic privacy screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ala

product_meta.title: Privacy Screen for MacBook Air 13 inch|2-Way Magnetic Privacy Filter for MacBook Air 13.3 inch with Retina Display, Fits 2011-Early 2018 Models. NOT for MacBook 13 inch Pro Models
product_meta.description:
Apple MacBook Air Magnetic Removable Privacy Screen Filter only fits MacAir 13 inch Retina laptops. It is not compatible with MacBook Pro models. 

 Magnetic Privacy Filters are designed to prevent Shoulder surfing and "visual hacking" a growing form of identity theft in which private on-screen information is either viewed or photographed over the shoulder. 
Unprotected screens expose private and sensitive information, business plans, patient information, trade secrets, and student work. 
Protect your sensitive information with a Privacy Screen. 
New Blue Light Protection Technology prevents harmful exposure you receive from long-term exposure to screens. 
Privacy filter function starts at 30-degree angle side to side and there is an effective blackout from side views outside the 60-degree viewing angle. 

 Please Note: For maximum functionality, you will need to dim your screen. 
When the Magnetic Screen is on, there will be a minor gap (about 1/16 of an inch) not allowing the computer to fully close. This is due to the magnet and does not affect functionality. 

 You get: 
One Magnetic Privacy Filter. This filter only fits 13 inch MacBook Air Retina Display models. It is not compatible with MacBook Pro Models. 
The satisfaction that your screen privacy is protected from unwanted prying eyes. 

 To determine your MacBook Pro Model Type and Retina display: 
Click on the Apple logo at the top-left corner of your screen. 
Click on "About This Mac" 
Write down your model, version, and serial number. Determine which Apple device model you have, including the correct screen size. 

 Buy with confidence. We will replace your item if there are any issues whatsoever
feature_bullets: PRIVACY FILTER DESIGN FOR MacBook Air 13 inch LED-backlit Retina Display with IPS technology 2011 through Early 2018Models. PrivatLiv MAGNETIC Privacy Screen Innovative anti peep privacy screen offers 8 layers of film to ensure privacy and visual protection. Be confident and comfortable in public and keep sensitive data secure.

OPTIMIZED PRIVACY SECURITY privacy screen for MacAir 13.3 inch screen. KEEP VISUAL HACKERS AWAY: Highly reliable MAGNETIC PRIVACY SCREEN protector keeps SENSITIVE DATA AND INFORMATION SAFE when in public places and workplaces. Prevents "SHOULDER SURFING” and "VISUAL HACKING".

MAGNETIC PRIVACY SCREEN BLUE LIGHT technology and UV protection for your MacBook Air 13 inch model. PrivatLiv screens not only provide privacy but also protection from harmful UV Light and curbs blue light, protecting eyes from long-term effects of screen exposure. Removable Privacy Screens also keeps your screen safe from dust and scratches.

MacBook Air 13.3 inch MAGNETIC PRIVACY SCREEN CONVENIENTLY COMES ON AND OFF: Easy to apply and removable privacy screen guard. It can be removed multiple times without the messy inconvenience of 3M double sided tape. For your convenience, we have provided six barely-visible silicone glue strips if the bottom of the screen starts to lift.

EASY TO CLEAN WITHOUT COMPROMISING the CLARITY of your retina display screen allowing you to keep your screen free of fingerprints, dust, and scratches. 90-day satisfaction guaranteed. Please Note: When the Magnetic Screen is on, there will be a MINOR GAP (about 1/16 of an inch) not allowing the computer to fully close. This is due to the magnet and does not affect functionality.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars37 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
